pages.title: White Rhino
pages.text: The white rhinoceros, white rhino or square-lipped rhinoceros ($(o)Ceratotherium simum$()) is the largest extant species of rhinoceros.$(br2)It has a wide mouth used for grazing and is the most social of all rhino species.

pages.title: White Rhino
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Randomly active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:melon_slice$(br2)Number of Offspring: 1$(br2)Growth time: 12 Days
